example.text: [The water used [*]]-43 comes from the Chishui river that [*T*-42] flows overcinnabar quality soil and selectively uses such locally produced raw materials as sorghum , high quality wheat ,etc. and is fermented [*-43] during the period from the Chinese Dragon Boat Festival to the Double NinthFestival .
example.arg: during the period from the Chinese Dragon BoatFestival to the Double Ninth Festival
